document.discussion_title: 黒部峡谷トロッコ電車に乗って、富山県の雄大な自然を堪能! | MATCHA - 訪日外国人観光客向けWebマガジン
document.topic_text: Hello, I'm Keisuke. living Asakusa Tokyo Japan. Love triathlon(Ironman), traveling, reading, eating and my job. I really really like Japan but I think Japan should be more kindly to traveler. 関連タグ
